articles.content: Luton boss Nathan Jones said Watford caught his side on a really bad day, exacerbated by a sickness bug that struck down three of his players before the game and forced captain Sonny Bradley off at h… [+8525 chars]

articles.author: Dan Quarrell
articles.title: Referee warns Zhou Yuelong in surprising incident over shot in Northern Ireland Open final with Mark Allen - Eurosport COM
articles.description: There was a surprising incident during the fourth frame of the Northern Ireland Open on Sunday as Zhou Yuelong was given an unexpected warning.
articles.content:
'You need to decide' - Referee warns Zhou over taking too long on shot
00:00:44

articles.title: Akanji: We trained for Haaland’s Brighton opener - Manchester City FC
articles.description: Manuel Akanji has revealed City’s opener in the 3-1 victory over Brighton was a product of our detailed pre-match preparation.
articles.content:
And the defender has praised Erling Haaland for adding another dimension to Citys attacking play.

articles.author: Mike Bacon
articles.title: Ipswich Town: League One lowdown as Plymouth draw - East Anglian Daily Times
articles.description: Plymouth are just two points clear at the top ahead of Ipswich Town, after letting a two-goal lead slip in a 2-2 draw at Bristol Rovers.
articles.content:
Plymouth are just two points clear of Ipswich Town at the top of League One after letting a two-goal lead slip in a 2-2 draw at Bristol Rovers on Saturday.
Ipswich beat Derby 1-0 on Friday night.

articles.description: Wanderers arrived at the Wham Stadium to find a note pinned to the dressing room door, addressed to Dion Charles.
articles.content:
